mapper.select: SELECT cl.no, cl.student_no AS sno, cl.counseling_date AS date, cl.counseling_contents AS contents, s.name AS studentName FROM counseling_log cl JOIN students s ON cl.student_no = s.no ORDER BY cl.counseling_date DESC

SELECT cl.no, cl.student_no AS sno, cl.counseling_date AS date, cl.counseling_contents AS contents, s.name AS studentName FROM counseling_log cl JOIN students s ON cl.student_no = s.no WHERE cl.no = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO counseling_log (student_no, counseling_date, counseling_contents) VALUES (#{sno}, #{date}, #{contents})
